ComicInfo.Summary: Shadowhawk crashes into the Youngblood compound trying to find help with his rapidly degenerating physical condition (he is battling the advanced stages AIDS). Badrock takes him to his father who agrees to try and make a new body for 'Hawk. A band of generic soldiers attack and the machine that would save Shadowhawk's life is destroyed in the mayhem. Shadowhawk leaves to try and find an alternate source of help.
